acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in a POJO with basic jvm types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldGenerateBasicTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo

Then the Pojo OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 48 byteObjectField = 44 shortField = 96 shortObjectField = 14 charField = 7 charObjectField = P intField = -533558164 intObjectField = 2064833895 longField = 223657002004622 longObjectField = 223657000140714 floatField = 0.53837186 floatObjectField = 0.8005981 doubleField = 0.4236867891032259 doubleObjectField = 0.9371658463705483 stringField = XLGeZjm2HZ objectField = java.lang.Object@3d6fe206 calendarField = Sun May 31 18:57:29 BST 2015 dateField = Sun May 31 18:57:29 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@63f38fb1 intArray = [I@4d5d5473 booleanArray = [Z@3412a1dd bigDecimalField = 152087388253 ) should not be null
Then the Pojo should contain some data
